text:
<@UCT32UWDV> <@UGDF9EBPW> <@U01QVR44MEY> <@UD53A9UUR> <@U26BLKGE4>
<https://cooking.nytimes.com/recipes/1020256-juicy-lucy-burger>

This version of the jucy lucy recipe doesn’t require a special press that I have, but it gets the job done.
I prefer to use shredded cheddar cheese instead of american but american does melt faster.

Just don’t do the horrific thing a friend of my parents once did - don’t cut the burger in half before eating, just eat it as is.

If you want to know why I’m posting about an amazing burger, you’re gonna have to tune into <@UGDF9EBPW> and <@UCT32UWDV>’s Developer HUG <https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-the-pbampj-of-crm-customization-react-based-custom-cards/>
